50.description: Lightest primary shade - backgrounds, subtle highlights

100.description: Very light primary - hover states, light backgrounds

200.description: Light primary - borders, dividers, disabled states

500.description: Base primary - main brand color, primary actions

700.description: Dark primary - active states, text on light backgrounds

800.description: Very dark primary - high contrast text, headers

900.description: Darkest primary - maximum contrast, important text

950.description: Ultra dark primary - extreme contrast, deep backgrounds
